panels.description: The number of pods that are up and ready for processing
panels.title: Ready Pods

panels.description: The average number of active subscribers
panels.title: Active Subscribers

panels.description: The current number of messages per second received by subscribers
panels.title: Response Rate

panels.description: The max number of overall messages per second received by subscribers
panels.title: Max Response Rate

panels.description: The average amount of time a client is subscribed
panels.title: Subscription Duration

panels.description: The average number of active subscribers
panels.title: Subscribers

panels.description: The rate of incoming requests
panels.title: Request Rate

panels.description: The time it takes for a request to be considered complete
panels.title: Request Duration

panels.description: The number of messages per second sent to subscribers
panels.title: Response Rate

panels.description: The number of errors encountered per second
panels.title: Error Rate

panels.description: The difference between the time consensus was achieved and the gRPC API received the entity
panels.title: Consensus to Delivery

panels.description: The amount of memory configured for the app
panels.title: Memory Usage

panels.description: The number of threads in use by the JVM
panels.title: Threads

panels.description: The number of open file descriptors used by the process
panels.title: File Descriptors

panels.description: The amount of time it takes to invoke the Spring Data repository method to execute a query.
panels.title: Query Latency

panels.description: The rate of commands sent to Redis
panels.title: Redis Rate

panels.description: The amount of time it takes to execute a Redis command
panels.title: Redis Latency

panels.description: The amount of time the process has been running.
panels.title: Uptime

panels.description: The rate of log events written by the application
panels.title: Rate

panels.description: How much time each message took to be processed by the listener.
panels.title: Listener Latency

panels.description: The rate of messages received by this listener.
panels.title: Listener Rate

panels.description: How much time each message took to be retrieved.
panels.title: Retriever Latency

panels.description: The rate of messages retrieved from the database
panels.title: Retriever Rate

panels.description: Measures delays between onNext signals (or between onSubscribe and first onNext)
panels.title: Retriever onNext Delay

panels.description: The current number of threads in the executor pool
panels.title: Executor Pool

panels.description: The amount of time tasks took to execute
panels.title: Task Execution Latency

panels.description: The number of tasks that are queued for execution
panels.title: Queued Tasks
